doctor.name: Dr. Ratan Kumar Paul
doctor.degree: MBBS (DMC), D. Ortho Surgery (NITOR), MS Ortho Surgery (NITOR)
doctor.info: Dr. Ratan Kumar Paul is a Orthopedic Surgeon in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), D. Ortho Surgery (NITOR), MS Ortho Surgery (NITOR). He is a Assistant Professor, Orthopedics at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Ratan Kumar Paul at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 5pm to 6pm (Sun & Tuesday).

chamber.address: City Tower, House No - 1, Mir Mosharraf Hossain Road, Court Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. Mohd. Sayedul Islam (Saju)
doctor.info: Dr. Mohd. Sayedul Islam (Saju)is a skilled orthopedics specialist and surgeon in Kushtia, holding MBBS (RU), BCS (Health), and MS (Ortho Surgery) from NITOR. He serves as a Consultant in Orthopedic Surgery at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital, with expertise in the treatment and surgical management of fractures, joint dislocations, arthritis, back and neck pain, bone infections, sports injuries, joint replacement, spine problems, and trauma-related bone issues. Dr. Mohd. Sayedul Islam (Saju) sees patients at Sono Consultation Center, Kushtia (Sono Tower 2, Court Para, Kushtia, Bangladesh) from 4pm on Saturday, Sunday, Monday, and Wednesday.

chamber.address: Sono Tower 2, Court Para, Kushtia, Bangladesh
